data>getCountryPolygon.yml@1|country.description: ISO3 country code for country of interest. For a list of ISO3 country codes, look [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes).
data>getCountryPolygon.yml@1|country.label: ISO3 country code

data>getCountryPolygon.yml@1|region.description: ISO 3166-2 code for province or region, see more [here](en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2)
data>getCountryPolygon.yml@1|region.label: State/Province code

pipeline@2.label: Coordinate reference system
pipeline@2.description:
Numerical value referring to the EPSG code (European Petroleum Survey Group) associated with the spatial reference system that will be used as a reference for the study area.
This numerical value specifies the projection and geodetic datum used to define the coordinates and spatial representation of the data in the study area.
This MUST be in a projected reference system (not lat long).

For further information on coordinate systems and EPSG codes, you can access the official database on the EPSG website at [https://epsg.org/home.html](https://epsg.org/home.html).
The website provides documentation, resources, and tools for searching and understanding the EPSG codes used in various geospatial contexts.

data>getCountryPolygon.yml@1|country_pol.description: Polygon of the chosen country or region in the crs of choice in geopackage format
data>getCountryPolygon.yml@1|country_pol.label: Polygon of country or region

data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|bbox.description: boundary box around area of interest in the order of xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax
data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|bbox.label: Bounding box

metadata.name: Get country bounding box
metadata.description: Get the bounding box of a country or state/province of interest (country polygons pulled from rnaturalearth).

references.text: Massicotte P, South A (2023). _rnaturalearth: World Map Data from Natural Earth_. R package version 1.0.1, <https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rnaturalearth>.
